thread.title: BRIEF-Matica Technologies AG plans cash capital increase
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Matica Technologies AG plans cash capital increase | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Matica Technologies AG plans cash capital increase
text:
Sept 8 Matica Technologies AG
* news: Matica Technologies AG: subscription offer for cash capital increase
* Says German regulator Bafin has approved a securities prospectus for public offering of 5,188,212 new no-par value bearer shares
* Says subscription period is between Sept. 10-23 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
